message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, given its features and benefits. I'm initially proposing a price of $13,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $15,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500? This would still be a great deal for you considering the value you'll be getting.
